{{cpp/numeric/random/gamma_distribution/title|alpha, beta}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/gamma_distribution/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|num=1|1=
RealType alpha() const;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|num=2|1=
RealType beta() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the distribution parameters the distribution has been constructed with.

@1@ Returns the {{math|α}} distribution parameter. It is also known as the shape parameter. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

@2@ Returns the {{math|β}} distribution parameter. It is also known as the scale parameter. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ Floating point value identifying the {{math|α}} parameter.

@2@ Floating point value identifying the {{math|β}} parameter.
